document.full_text: one way to resolve the crisis over a two-year budget might be to write an 18-month budget now, and revisit it in 2013 to handle the remaining six months.
document.title: the texas tribune: an 18-month budget offers a way out
lines_and_colors: one way to resolve the crisis over a two-year budget might be to write an 18-month budget now, and revisit it in 2013 to handle the remaining six months.
